sense.def:
A latch
je kovinska palica na vratih ali lesi. Pritrjena je tako, da so vrata zapahnjena, ko pa jo dvignemo, jih odpremo.

To latch a door or gate
pomeni zapreti vrata ali leso z zapahom.

Kadar so vrata s ključavnico, ki se zaklepa samodejno,
on the latch
, je ključavnica nastavljena tako, da se takrat, ko vrata zapremo, ne zaklene samodejno.

seg.quote: He closed the door and left it on the latch in case Tom had forgotten his key.

sense.def:
To latch onto someone or something
pomeni zaplesti se z nekom ali nečim, ker nas to zanima ali nam koristi;

seg.quote: She latched onto someone with a family business.
